ygData.subject: Re: Weapon choices..
ygData.msgSnippet: Ashenwood Short Spear and Dragoon Dirk - IMHO a great combo until you can get Staff of Writhing and Obsidian Shard.  And just use other stuff to keep 1sh and
ygData.messageBody:
Ashenwood Short Spear and Dragoon Dirk - IMHO a great combo until you can
get Staff of Writhing and Obsidian Shard. And just use other stuff to keep
1sh and 1hb maxxed as you level. Someday, you will be 2YK compliant. But
it takes many levels of piercing followed by a lot of blunting to get back
to serious slashing.

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 46 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. '...not until i get a couple bubs of buffer - maybe even wait for
47..."

----- Original Message -----
From: <BROWNCA9@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2000 11:16 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Weapon choices..


> From: BROWNCA9@...
>
> Hi there, I'm Hire. 14th level bard on Vallon ZEK! I'm nearing
> the magical L17 and dual wield, and I'm wondering what are the
> most effective weapon?
